structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.text:
As used in KRS 431.2135 and 431.240:
"Condemned person" means a person for whom a specific day of execution is fixed by a mandate from the Kentucky Supreme Court or a warrant signed by the Governor.
"Insane" means the condemned person does not have the ability to understand:
That the person is about to be executed; and
Why the person is to be executed.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 156, effective July 15, 1998.
